content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The negotiation did not lead to a mutual agreement due to the fact that I was looking for a higher price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Max Müller, as an 8.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended because the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner, focusing on the rental price of the apartment. There were no personal attacks or biased comments that could have led to discrimination or offense.
name: Peter Schmidt
